title: Wild rice & Chicken
description: Easy to make after the work for healthy and delicious dinner.
story:
Really fast recipe and you can use almost all the vegetables you have. You can season it with some soy sauce. And of course, you can use salmon or shrimps instead of chicken.
This easy recipe could go as a side dish for fish or meat or can be just good by itself.
instructions: Sout√© finely chopped onion on some olive oil.
Add chopped bell peppper to onion.
Add egg and mix well (so that egg would become scrambled).
